Absorb Magic.description:
Bolster your defenses to absorb the next spell projectile cast at you and heal yourself for up to 15% of your Max Health.

While slotted, the amount of damage you can block is increased by 8% and the cost of blocking is reduced by 8%.
Absorb Magic.name: Absorb Magic

Absorption Field.description:
Create a globe of magic suppression, stunning enemies within and dispelling enemy placed effects for 10 seconds. 

Allies entering the area receive Major Expedition, Fortitude, Intellect, and Endurance, increasing Magicka, Stamina, and Health Regeneration as well as Movement Speed by 20% for 12 seconds.

Enemy players will be silenced rather than stunned.
Absorption Field.name: Absorption Field

Acid Spray.description:
Fire a burst of arrows in one shot, dealing ##f1## Poison Damage to enemies in front of you. 

Also reduces enemies' Movement Speed by 40% and deals an additional ##f2## Poison Damage over 5 seconds.
Acid Spray.name: Acid Spray

Aggressive Horn.description:
Sound your war horn to rally your forces, increasing Max Magicka, Health, and Stamina for you and your allies by 10%.

You and your allies also gain Major Force, increasing your critical strike damage by 30% for 9.5 seconds.
Aggressive Horn.name: Aggressive Horn

Agony.description:
Shackle an enemy in torment, stunning them for 30 seconds and dealing ##f1## Magic Damage over 5 seconds when the effect ends.

Stun is broken if the enemy takes damage.
Agony.name: Agony

Ambush.description:
Flash through the shadows and ambush enemy for ##f1## Physical Damage , stunning them for 1.5 seconds.

Also grants you Empower, increasing damage of your next attack by 20%.

If the target is a player, they are immobilized for 1 second instead of being stunned.
Ambush.name: Ambush

Annulment.description: Surround yourself with a net of magic negation to absorb up to ##f1## spell damage over 20 seconds.
Annulment.name: Annulment

Anti-Cavalry Caltrops.description:
Hurl an exploding ball of caltrops that scatter over the target area, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage each second and reducing Movement Speed by 30%.

Also rapidly drains mount stamina and forces riders to dismount.
Anti-Cavalry Caltrops.name: Anti-Cavalry Caltrops

Arrow Barrage.description: Launch a multitude of arrows into the sky to rain down, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage to enemies in the target area every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds.
Arrow Barrage.name: Arrow Barrage

Arrow Spray.description:
Fire a burst of arrows in one shot, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage to enemies in front of you. 

Also reduces enemies' Movement Speed by 40% for 5 seconds.
Arrow Spray.name: Arrow Spray

Ash Cloud.description:
Summon a scorching cloud of ash at the target location, dealing ##f1## Flame Damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds.

Also reduces enemy Movement Speed by 70%.
Ash Cloud.name: Ash Cloud

Aspect of Terror.description: Summon a dark spirit to terrify up to 2 enemies, causing them to flee in fear for 4 seconds.
Aspect of Terror.name: Aspect of Terror

Assassin's Blade.description: Thrust a magic blade with lethal precision to stab an enemy for ##f1## Magic Damage. Causes 300% more damage to low health targets.
Assassin's Blade.name: Assassin's Blade

Aurora Javelin.description:
Hurl your spear at an enemy with godlike strength, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage and knocking them back 5 meters.

Increasing range increases damage, up to 40%.
Aurora Javelin.name: Aurora Javelin

Backlash.description:
Summon an expanding beam of pure sunlight to doom an enemy, storing all damage taken for 6 seconds and releasing it with a 36% increase.

Maximum damage: ##f1##.
Backlash.name: Backlash

Balance.description:
Barter with Oblivion to trade vitality for power, sacrificing ##f1## Health in exchange for ##f2## Magicka.

Also grants you Major Fortitude, increasing your Health Regeneration by 20% for 20 seconds.

The exchange prevents you from healing yourself for 4 seconds, but you can receive healing from other players.
Balance.name: Balance

Ball of Lightning.description:
Transform yourself into pure energy and flash forward, stunning enemies near origin location for 2 seconds. Also absorbs any spell projectiles directed at you for 6.5 seconds. 

Casting again within 4 seconds costs 50% more Magicka.
Ball of Lightning.name: Ball of Lightning

Barrier.description: Invoke defensive tactics to protect yourself and nearby allies with wards that each absorb up to ##f1## damage.
Barrier.name: Barrier

Binding Javelin.description: Hurl your spear at an enemy with godlike strength, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage and knocking them back 5 meters and down for 3.5 seconds.
Binding Javelin.name: Binding Javelin

Biting Jabs.description:
Launch a relentless assault, striking enemies in front of you four times with your Aedric spear and dealing ##f1## Physical Damage with each strike.

The nearest enemy takes 140% additional damage and is knocked back on the last hit.

Also grants you Major Savagery, increasing Weapon Critical rating by 2099 for 8 seconds.
Biting Jabs.name: Biting Jabs

Blade Cloak.description:
Create a ring of floating blades, reducing damage you take from area attacks by 20%.

While active, every 3 seconds the blades strike nearby enemies, damaging them for ##f1## Physical Damage.
Blade Cloak.name: Blade Cloak

Blazing Shield.description:
Surround yourself with a solar shield that absorbs damage equal to 30% of your Max Health. 

Each nearby enemy increases the shield's strength by 4%.

Nearby enemies take 53% of the damage absorbed when the shield expires.
Blazing Shield.name: Blazing Shield

Blazing Spear.description:
Send your spear into the heavens to bring down a shower of divine wrath, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage to enemies in the target area and an additional ##f2## Magic Damage each second.

Also stuns one enemy for 2 seconds.

While active, an ally can pick up a spear shard, restoring 25% Stamina plus an additional 1700 Stamina over 10 seconds.
Blazing Spear.name: Blazing Spear

Blessing Of Restoration.description:
Slam your staff down to bless allies in front of you, healing them for ##f1##.

Allies also gain Minor Resolve and Minor Ward, increasing Armor and Spell Resistance by 960 for 15 seconds.
Blessing Of Restoration.name: Blessing Of Restoration

Blessing of Protection.description:
Slam your staff down to bless allies in front of you, healing them for ##f1##.

Allies also gain Minor Resolve and Minor Ward, increasing Armor and Spell Resistance by 960 for 8 seconds.
Blessing of Protection.name: Blessing of Protection

Blinding Flurry.description:
Flood an enemy with steel, battering them with six consecutive attacks for ##f1##, ##f1##, ##f1##, ##f1##, ##f1##, and ##f2## Physical Damage.

Each hit has a 7% chance of setting the enemy off balance.
Blinding Flurry.name: Blinding Flurry

Blood Altar.description:
Conjure a fountain of blood from the enemies you've slain and grant Major Fortitude to yourself and nearby allies, increasing Health Regeneration by 20%.

Allies can also activate the Blood Funnel synergy to heal themselves for 40% of their Max Health.
Blood Altar.name: Blood Altar

Blood Craze.description:
Slice enemy with both weapons to cause deep lacerations and ##f1## Physical Damage.

Lacerations deal an additional ##f2## Physical Damage over 9 seconds and heal you for ##f3## Health every 2 seconds for the duration.
Blood Craze.name: Blood Craze

Blur.description: Surround yourself in a phantasmic aura to gain Major Evasion, increasing your Dodge chance by 20% for 26 seconds.
Blur.name: Blur

Bolstering Darkness.description:
Conjure a ring of shadows, reducing damage to you by 60% and your allies by 30%. Also reduces enemy movement by 70%.

Low Health allies in the target area can activate Dark Resurgence, granting invisibility and healing them for ##f1## over 4 seconds.
Bolstering Darkness.name: Bolstering Darkness

Bolt Escape.description:
Transform yourself into pure energy and flash forward, stunning enemies near origin location for 2 seconds. 

Casting again within 4 seconds costs 50% more Magicka.
Bolt Escape.name: Bolt Escape

Bombard.description:
Fire a burst of arrows in one shot, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage to enemies in front of you and immobilizing them for 3 seconds. 

Even when enemies can move again, their Movement Speed is reduced by 40% for 5 seconds.
Bombard.name: Bombard

Bone Shield.description:
Surround yourself with a whirlwind of bones, absorbing physical damage equivalent to 30% of your Max Health.  

Allies can activate the Bone Wall synergy, absorbing damage to allies equal to 60% of their Max Health. The wall lasts 10 seconds and affects up to four nearby allies.
Bone Shield.name: Bone Shield

Bone Surge.description:
Surround yourself with a whirlwind of bones, absorbing physical damage equivalent to 30% of your Max Health.  

Allies can activate the Spinal Surge synergy, absorbing damage to allies equal to 60% of their Max Health. It also grants them Minor Vitality, which increases healing received by 8%.  

The Spinal Surge synergy lasts 10 seconds and affects up to four nearby allies.
Bone Surge.name: Bone Surge

Bound Aegis.description:
Protect yourself with the power of Oblivion, creating a suit of Daedric mail that grants Minor Resolve and Minor Ward, increasing your Armor and Spell Resistance by 960.  

The armor also increases your Max Magicka by 8%.
Bound Aegis.name: Bound Aegis

Bound Armaments.description:
Protect yourself with the power of Oblivion, creating a suit of Daedric mail that grants Minor Resolve, increasing your Armor by 960. 

The armor also increases your damage with heavy attacks by 11% and increases your Max Stamina by 8%.
Bound Armaments.name: Bound Armaments

Bound Armor.description:
Protect yourself with the power of Oblivion, creating a suit of Daedric mail that grants Minor Resolve, increasing your Armor by 960.  

The armor also increases your Max Magicka by 5%.
Bound Armor.name: Bound Armor

Boundless Storm.description:
Manifest yourself as lightning to gain Major Resolve and Major Ward, increasing Armor and Spell Resistance by 5120 for 15 seconds.

Also grants Major Expedition, increasing your Movement Speed 40% for 7.5 seconds.

While active, nearby enemies will take ##f1## Shock Damage each second.
Boundless Storm.name: Boundless Storm

Brawler.description:
Swat enemies in front of you with a mighty swing, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage and causing them to bleed for an additional ##f2## Physical Damage over 10 seconds.

Also shields you from damage for 8 seconds, absorbing up to ##f3## damage plus 100% for each enemy hit.
Brawler.name: Brawler

Breath of Life.description:
Share your inner light with a wounded ally to heal ##f1## Health.

Also heals up to 2 other nearby allies for ##f2##.
Breath of Life.name: Breath of Life

Brutal Pounce.description:
Pounce on an enemy with primal fury to deal ##f1## Physical Damage and stun them if they are off balance.

Deals an additional AB_PHYSICAL_DAMAGE to the target and nearby enemies.
Brutal Pounce.name: Brutal Pounce

Burning Breath.description: Exhale a flaming blast, dealing ##f1## Flame Damage to enemies in front of you and an additional ##f2## Flame Damage over 8 seconds.  Also causes Major Fracture, which reduces enemies' armor by 5120.
Burning Breath.name: Burning Breath

Burning Embers.description: Slash an enemy with flame for ##f1## Flame Damage and an additional ##f2## Flame Damage over 8.5 seconds. Heals you for 36% of damage inflicted when the effect ends.
Burning Embers.name: Burning Embers

Burning Talons.description:
Call forth talons from the ground to deal ##f1## Physical Damage and immobilize nearby enemies for 4 seconds. 

Talons also burn enemies for ##f2## Flame Damage over time.

While enemies are held, allies can activate Impale to deal ##f3## Magic Damage.
Burning Talons.name: Burning Talons

Caltrops.description: Hurl an exploding ball of caltrops that scatter over the target area, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage each second and reducing Movement Speed by 30%.
Caltrops.name: Caltrops

Camouflaged Hunter.description:
Gives your attacks a 15% chance to cause an additional ##f1## Magic Damage against undead and Daedra and a 4% chance against all other enemies. If in stealth, attacks deal an extra ##f2## Magic Damage to undead and Daedra.

Killing undead and Daedra refreshes the effect's duration. 

While slotted, undead and Daedra are easier to see and you gain Major Savagery, increasing your Weapon Critical rating by 2099.
Camouflaged Hunter.name: Camouflaged Hunter

Carve.description:
Swat enemies in front of you with a mighty swing, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage and causing them to bleed for an additional ##f2## Physical Damage over 10 seconds.

You also gain Minor Heroism, granting you an extra Ultimate every 1.5 seconds for 9 seconds.
Carve.name: Carve

Channeled Focus.description:
Create a rune of celestial protection to gain Major Resolve and Major Ward, increasing Armor and Spell Resistance by 5120.

If you leave the rune's vicinity, the effects dissipate after 8 seconds.

While near the rune, you also recover 120 Magicka every 0.5 seconds.
Channeled Focus.name: Channeled Focus

Charging Maneuver.description:
Mobilize your forces, granting Major Expedition and Major Gallop to you and your allies, increasing Movement Speed by 40% and Mounted Speed by 40%.

Also grants immunity to snares and immobilizations.

The effect ends if you initiate an attack, but you gain Minor Expedition, increasing your Movement Speed by 10% for 8 seconds.
Charging Maneuver.name: Charging Maneuver

Choking Talons.description:
Call forth talons from the ground to deal ##f1## Physical Damage and immobilize nearby enemies for 4 seconds. 

Talons also afflict enemies with Minor Maim, reducing their damage by 15% for 7 seconds. 

While enemies are held, allies can activate Impale to deal ##f2## Magic Damage.
Choking Talons.name: Choking Talons

Cinder Storm.description:
Summon a scorching cloud of ash at the target location, dealing ##f1## Flame Damage to nearby enemies every 0.5 seconds. 

Also reduces enemies' Movement Speed 70% for 2.5 seconds even if they leave the area.
Cinder Storm.name: Cinder Storm

Circle of Protection.description:
Brand the earth at your location with a rune of protection. Allies in the target area gain Minor Protection, reducing damage taken by 8%.

Allies are granted an additional 4% damage reduction against Daedra and undead.
Circle of Protection.name: Circle of Protection

Claws of Anguish.description:
Maul enemies in front of you with your tainted claws, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage and an additional ##f2## Disease Damage over 10 seconds.

Also afflicts enemies with Major Defile, reducing the effectiveness of healing on them by 30% for the effect's duration.
Claws of Anguish.name: Claws of Anguish

Claws of Life.description:
Maul enemies in front of you with your tainted claws, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage and an additional ##f2## Disease Damage over 10 seconds.

Also restores your Health, equivalent to 50% of the damage inflicted.
Claws of Life.name: Claws of Life

Cleanse.description:
Cleanse yourself and nearby allies, removing 2 negative effects and reducing the duration of any further negative effects by 50% for 6 seconds.

Allies that had a negative effect are also healed for 18% of their Max Health.
Cleanse.name: Cleanse

Cleansing Ritual.description:
Exalt in the sacred light of the Aedra to cleanse yourself of one harmful effect and heal nearby allies for ##f1## every 2 seconds for 12 seconds.

Allies can also activate Purify, removing harmful effects from themselves and healing them for an additional ##f2##.
Cleansing Ritual.name: Cleansing Ritual

Cleave.description: Swat enemies in front of you with a mighty swing, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage and causing them to bleed for an additional ##f2## Physical Damage over 10 seconds.
Cleave.name: Cleave

Coagulating Blood.description:
Draw on your draconic blood to heal 33% of missing Health.

Also grants Major Fortitude and Minor Vitality, increasing Health Regeneration by 20% and healing received by 8% for 23 seconds.
Coagulating Blood.name: Coagulating Blood

Combat Prayer.description:
Slam your staff down to bless allies in front of you, healing them for ##f1##.

Allies also gain Minor Berserk, Minor Resolve, and Minor Ward, increasing attack damage by 8% and Armor and Spell Resistance by 960 for 8 seconds.
Combat Prayer.name: Combat Prayer

Concealed Weapon.description:
Slash an enemy for ##f1## Magic Damage. 

Attacking with Concealed Weapon while stealthed or invisible stuns the enemy and sets them off balance for 0.5 seconds.

While slotted, movement speed while stealthed or invisible is increased by 25%.
Concealed Weapon.name: Concealed Weapon

Conjured Ward.description: Conjure globes of Daedric energy to protect you and your summoned creatures. Each globe can absorb ##f1## damage.
Conjured Ward.name: Conjured Ward

Consuming Darkness.description:
Conjure a ring of shadows, reducing damage to you and your allies by 30% and reducing enemy movement by 70%.

Low health allies in the target area can activate Hidden Refresh, granting invisibility and healing them for ##f1## over 4 seconds.
Consuming Darkness.name: Consuming Darkness

Consuming Trap.description:
Lay claim to enemy souls, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage to the target and one other nearby enemy over 10 seconds.

Fills a soul gem and restores 10% Health, Magicka, and Stamina if an affected enemy dies.
Consuming Trap.name: Consuming Trap

Corrosive Armor.description:
Ignite the molten lava in your veins to cap incoming damage at 3% of your Max Health and deal ##f1## Flame Damage to nearby enemies each second for 9 seconds . 

While active, your attacks ignore 100% of an enemy's Armor.
Corrosive Armor.name: Corrosive Armor

Crescent Sweep.description:
Swing your Aedric spear around with holy vengeance, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage to all nearby enemies and an additional ##f2## Magic Damage every 2 seconds for 6 seconds.

Enemies in front of you take 33% more initial damage.
Crescent Sweep.name: Crescent Sweep

Cripple.description:
Sap an enemy's agility and bolster your own, reducing their Movement Speed by 40% and granting you Major Expedition, which increases your Movement Speed by 40%.

Affected enemy also takes ##f1## Magic Damage over 8 seconds.
Cripple.name: Cripple

Crippling Grasp.description:
Sap an enemy's agility and bolster your own, reducing their Movement Speed by 40% and granting you Major Expedition, which increases your Movement Speed by 40%.

Affected enemy also takes ##f1## Magic Damage and ##f2## Magic Damage more over 8 seconds.
Crippling Grasp.name: Crippling Grasp

Critical Charge.description: Launch across the earth and smash an enemy for ##f1## Physical Damage, always causing a critical strike.
Critical Charge.name: Critical Charge

Critical Rush.description:
Launch across the earth and smash an enemy for ##f1## Physical Damage, always causing a critical strike.

Deals up to 68% bonus damage, based on distance traveled.
Critical Rush.name: Critical Rush

Critical Surge.description:
Invoke Meridia's name to get a rush of power, granting you Major Brutality, increasing Weapon Damage by 20% for 20 seconds.

While active, critical strikes heal you for 60% of the damage done.
Critical Surge.name: Critical Surge

Crushing Shock.description:
Focus all the elemental energies with your staff and blast an enemy for ##f1## Flame Damage, ##f1## Cold Damage, and ##f1## Shock Damage.

The blast also has a 40% chance of afflicting an enemy with Chilled, Burning, and Concussion status effects.

Enemies hit while casting are stunned and set off balance for 3 seconds.
Crushing Shock.name: Crushing Shock

Crystal Blast.description:
Conjure dark crystals to bombard an enemy, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage and knocking them down for 2 seconds. 

Nearby enemies take ##f2## Magic Damage.
Crystal Blast.name: Crystal Blast

Crystal Fragments.description:
Conjure dark crystals to bombard an enemy, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage and knocking them down for 2 seconds.

Casting other spells has a 35% chance of causing your next Crystal Fragments to be instant, doing 20% more damage, and costing 50% less Magicka.
Crystal Fragments.name: Crystal Fragments

Crystal Shard.description: Conjure dark crystals to bombard an enemy, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage and knocking them down for 2 seconds.
Crystal Shard.name: Crystal Shard

Daedric Curse.description:
Curse an enemy with a destructive rune, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage to the target enemy after 6 seconds and ##f2## Magic Damage to any enemies nearby.

You can have only one curse active at any given time.
Daedric Curse.name: Daedric Curse

Daedric Minefield.description:
Surprise your foes by placing 5 volatile Daedric caltrops that explode when an enemy comes close, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage and immobilizing the enemy for 1.5 seconds.

Mines take 3 seconds to activate.
Daedric Minefield.name: Daedric Minefield

Daedric Mines.description:
Surprise your foes by placing 3 volatile Daedric caltrops that explode when an enemy comes close, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage and immobilizing the enemy for 1.5 seconds.

Mines take 3 seconds to activate.
Daedric Mines.name: Daedric Mines

Daedric Prey.description:
Curse an enemy with a destructive rune, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage to the target enemy after 6 seconds and ##f2## Magic Damage to any enemies nearby. 

While the curse is active, your summoned Daedra deal an additional 30% damage to the target, except the Storm Atronach which only recieves a 20% damage bonus.

You can have only one curse active at any given time.
Daedric Prey.name: Daedric Prey

Daedric Tomb.description:
Surprise your foes by placing 3 volatile Daedric caltrops that explode when an enemy comes close, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage and immobilizing the enemy for 2 seconds.

Mines activate instantly.
Daedric Tomb.name: Daedric Tomb

Dampen Magic.description:
Surround yourself with a net of magic negation to absorb up to ##f1## spell damage over 26 seconds.

Amount of damage absorbed is increased by 6% for each piece of Light Armor equipped. 

Current bonus: 0%.
Dampen Magic.name: Dampen Magic

Dark Cloak.description: Cloak yourself in shadow to become invisible for 2.5 seconds and remove 4 damage over time effects.
Dark Cloak.name: Dark Cloak

Dark Conversion.description: Bargain with darkness to restore ##f1## Health and ##f2## Magicka at the expense of ##f3## Stamina per second.
Dark Conversion.name: Dark Conversion

Dark Deal.description: Bargain with darkness to restore ##f1## Health and ##f2## Stamina at the expense of ##f3## Magicka per second.
Dark Deal.name: Dark Deal

Dark Exchange.description: Bargain with darkness to restore ##f1## Health and ##f2## Magicka at the expense of ##f3## Stamina per second.
Dark Exchange.name: Dark Exchange

Dark Flare.description:
Conjure a ball of solar energy to heave at an enemy for ##f1## Magic Damage.

Afflicts target and nearby enemies with Major Defile, reducing the effectiveness of healing on them by 30% for 6 seconds.
 
Also grants you Empower, increasing the damage of your next attack by 20%.
Dark Flare.name: Dark Flare

Dark Shades.description:
Summon two shades to attack an enemy and fight at your side for 18 seconds. 

The shades' attacks deal ##f1## Magic Damage and cause Minor Maim, reducing the target's damage by 15% for 4 seconds.
Dark Shades.name: Dark Shades

Dark Talons.description:
Call forth talons from the ground to deal ##f1## Physical Damage and immobilize nearby enemies for 4 seconds. 

While enemies are held, an ally can activate Impale to deal ##f2## Magic Damage.
Dark Talons.name: Dark Talons

Dawnbreaker.description:
Arm yourself with Meridia's sacred sword and dispense her retribution, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage to enemies in front of you and an additional ##f2## Magic Damage over 4 seconds.

Damage against Daedra and undead is increased by 60%.
Dawnbreaker.name: Dawnbreaker

Dawnbreaker of Smiting.description:
Arm yourself with Meridia's sacred sword and dispense her retribution, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage to enemies in front of you and an additional ##f2## Magic Damage over 4 seconds.

Deals 60% additional damage to Daedra and undead and knocks them down for 5 seconds.
Dawnbreaker of Smiting.name: Dawnbreaker of Smiting

Deadly Cloak.description:
Create a ring of floating blades, reducing damage you take from area attacks by 20%.

While active, every 3 seconds the blades strike nearby enemies, damaging them for ##f1## Physical Damage.

Upon activation, this becomes Deadly Throw, allowing you to throw a knife at an enemy for ##f2## Physical Damage at no Stamina cost.
Deadly Cloak.name: Deadly Cloak

Death Stroke.description:
Ravage enemy with a spinning attack to deal ##f1## Magic Damage and increase your damage against them by 20%.

Also causes Major Defile, reducing the effectiveness of healing on the enemy by 30% for 6 seconds.
Death Stroke.name: Death Stroke

Debilitate.description:
Sap an enemy's agility and bolster your own, reducing their Movement Speed by 40% and granting you Major Expedition, which increases your Movement Speed by 40%.

Affected enemy also takes ##f1## Magic Damage over 8 seconds.
 
If the enemy dies while affected, 2520 of the Magicka cost is returned.
Debilitate.name: Debilitate

Deep Breath.description:
Channel draconic energy to steal ##f1## Health from up to 3 nearby enemies. 

Nearby enemies casting are interrupted and then stunned and set off balance for 2 seconds. 

After 2.5 seconds, you exhale fire, dealing ##f2## Flame Damage to nearby enemies.
Deep Breath.name: Deep Breath

Deep Slash.description:
Surprise enemy with a sweeping lunge, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage to the target and ##f2## Physical Damage to 2 nearby enemies. 

Reduces Movement Speed for all 3 enemies by 60% and afflicts them with Minor Maim, reducing their damage by 15% for 9 seconds.
Deep Slash.name: Deep Slash

Defensive Posture.description:
Bolster your defenses to reflect the next spell projectile targeting you back at the caster.

While slotted, the amount of damage you can block is increased by 8% and the cost of blocking is reduced by 8%.
Defensive Posture.name: Defensive Posture

Defensive Rune.description:
Place a rune of protection on yourself for 2 minutes. The next enemy to attack you is imprisoned in a sphere of dark magic for 16.6 seconds.

The effect ends if the enemy takes damage.
Defensive Rune.name: Defensive Rune

Defensive Stance.description:
Bolster your defenses to reflect the next spell projectile targeting you back at the caster and stun them for 4 seconds.

While slotted, the amount of damage you can block is increased by 8% and the cost of blocking is reduced by 8%.
Defensive Stance.name: Defensive Stance

Degeneration.description:
Bind an enemy with chaotic magic, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage over 12 seconds and restoring ##f2## Health to you plus an additional ##f2## every 6 seconds.

While active, your weapon attacks have a 15% chance to heal you for 115% of damage caused.

Also grants you Major Sorcery, increasing your Spell Damage by 20%.
Degeneration.name: Degeneration

Destructive Clench.description:
Devastate enemy with an enhanced charge from your staff, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage and ##f2## Magic Damage more over 5 seconds.

Also applies an effect based on your staff's attack element:

Flame Clench causes knock back and stun.

Frost Clench causes deep freeze.

Shock Clench deals damage to nearby enemies and has a chance of setting them off balance.
Destructive Clench.name: Destructive Clench

Destructive Reach.description:
Devastate enemy with an enhanced charge from your staff, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage and ##f2## Magic Damage more over 5 seconds.

Also applies an effect based on your staff's attack element:

Flame Reach causes knock back.

Frost Reach causes deep freeze.

Shock Reach deals damage to nearby enemies.
Destructive Reach.name: Destructive Reach

Destructive Touch.description:
Devastate enemy with an enhanced charge from your staff, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage and ##f2## Magic Damage more over 5 seconds.

Also applies an effect based on your staff's attack element:

Flame Touch causes knock back.

Frost Touch causes deep freeze.

Shock Touch deals damage to nearby enemies.
Destructive Touch.name: Destructive Touch

Dizzying Swing.description:
Slam enemy with an upward swing, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage and knocking them back 4 meters.

Enemy is also stunned for 3.5 seconds and afflicted with Minor Maim, reducing their damage by 15% for 10 seconds.
Dizzying Swing.name: Dizzying Swing

Double Take.description:
Surround yourself in a phantasmic aura to gain Major Evasion, increasing your Dodge chance by 20% for 26 seconds.

Also grants Major Expedition, increasing movement speed by 40% for 4 seconds.
Double Take.name: Double Take

Dragon Blood.description: Draw on your draconic blood to heal 33% of missing Health and gain Major Fortitude, increasing Health Regeneration by 20% for 20 seconds.
Dragon Blood.name: Dragon Blood

Dragon Fire Scale.description: Flex your scales to reflect up to 4 projectiles over 4 seconds. The reflected projectiles deal 35% additional damage to the attacker.
Dragon Fire Scale.name: Dragon Fire Scale

Dragon Leap.description: Launch yourself at an enemy, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage to all enemies in the area and knocking them back.
Dragon Leap.name: Dragon Leap

Dragonknight Standard.description:
Call down a flaming battle standard that deals ##f1## Flame Damage each second to nearby enemies and afflicts them with Major Defile, which reduces the effectiveness of healing on them by 30%. 

While the standard is up, an ally can activate Shackle to deal ##f2## Flame Damage and immobilize enemies in range.
Dragonknight Standard.name: Dragonknight Standard

Drain Power.description:
Siphon the vigor from your enemies' blood, dealing ##f1## Magic Damage to all nearby enemies.

If an enemy is hit, you gain Major Brutality, increasing Weapon Damage by 20% for 20 seconds.
Drain Power.name: Drain Power

Draining Shot.description:
Blast an enemy with an explosive arrow, dealing ##f1## Physical Damage, knocking them back 6 meters, and leaving them disoriented for 5 seconds.

Also reduced enemy's Movement Speed by 50% for 6 seconds.

Siege Shield.description: Create a protective sphere over your location that reduces damage from siege weapons by 35% .
